bibl.title: Notes on SB XIV 11714 (P. Haun. inv. 24 verso): Its Date and Relationship with the Recto (SB XXIV 15987).
bibl.note: P. Haun. Inv. 24 verso (= S.B. XIV, 11714) and recto (= S.B. XXIV, 15987). - Introduction. - The content and context of the texts. - The date of the text: the birth year of Tyrannis alias Isidora and the identification of Didymos alias Isidoros. The reason for making a copy of the census return. - Conclusion. - Pp. 224-228: Appendix: Attested ages of freedmen and freedwomen.
bibl.seg: Ryosuke Takahashi, Notes on SB XIV 11714 (P. Haun. inv. 24 verso): Its Date and Relationship with the Recto (SB XXIV 15987).

P. Haun. Inv. 24 verso (= S.B. XIV, 11714) and recto (= S.B. XXIV, 15987). - Introduction. - The content and context of the texts. - The date of the text: the birth year of Tyrannis alias Isidora and the identification of Didymos alias Isidoros. The reason for making a copy of the census return. - Conclusion. - Pp. 224-228: Appendix: Attested ages of freedmen and freedwomen.
